item.title: POJ1426 - Find The Multiple
item.description: 链接：https://vjudge.net/problem/POJ-1426 Task Given a positive integer n, write a program to find out a nonzero multiple m of n whose decimal representation contains only the digits 0 and 1. You may assume that
